Package org.acumos.federation.gateway

Gateway server for the Acumos Federation Gateway. Implements external API for querying this Acumos instance, internal API for this instance to query other instances, and subscriber interface for pulling solutions into this instance.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CatalogService
    API for accessing catalogs and related items.
    ContentService
    API for accessing content of artifacts and documents
    DeployedModelService
    API for sending model data to logstash Provides a service that will send model data to logstash
    LogstashService
    API for sending model data to logstash Provides a service that will send model data to logstash
    PeerService
    API for accessing information about peers and related items.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    Main program for the Acumos Federation Gateway Server.
    CatalogServiceImpl
    Service bean for implementing the Catalog service using Acumos CDS.
    Clients
    Defines all beans used to access outside services.
    ContentServiceImpl
    Service bean for implementing the ContentService using Nexus and Docker.
    DeployedModelServiceImpl  
    DockerConfig
    Configuration bean for Docker access parameters.
    FederationConfig
    Configuration bean for the external server in the Acumos Federation Gateway plus gateway-wide parameters.
    FederationController
    Controller bean for the external (public) API.
    FederationServer
    Define controller and configuration beans for the external (federation) server.
    GatewayController
    Controller bean for the internal (gateway) API.
    GatewayServer
    Define controller and configuration beans for the internal (gateway) server.
    LogstashClient
    Client for accessing the Logstash service configured with a http input plugin.
    LogstashServiceImpl  
    NexusClient
    Client for accessing the Nexus server.
    NexusConfig
    Configuration bean for Nexus server access parameters.
    PeerServiceImpl
    Service bean for implementing the peer service using CDS.
    Security
    Service bean implementing authentication and peer identification services on requests to the Federation Gateway.
    Security.Peer
    Principal specifying identity and permissions of a user.
    ServerConfig
    Configuration bean for the internal and external servers in the Acumos Federation Gateway.
    ServerConfig.Server
    Configuration bean for the server port number
    ServiceConfig
    Configuration bean for services used by the Acumos Federation Gateway.
    SubscriptionPoller
    Service bean for periodic polling of subscriptions to other peer's catalogs.
    TestMain  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestException
    Exception to abort current processing and reply to the peer with the specified HTTP response code and message.
